mapper.select: select distinct res.* from zgk_resource res left outer join zgk_role_resource rres on res.id = rres.resourceId left outer join zgk_role_user ru on rres.roleId = ru.roleId where ru.userId = #{userId} order by res.orderNum

select ra.* from zgk_resource res left outer join zgk_role_resource rres on res.id = rres.resourceId left outer join zgk_role_user ru on rres.roleId = ru.roleId left outer join zgk_resource_action ra on rres.resourceActionId = ra.id
and ru.userId in (#{condition.userId})
and ra.resourceId in (#{condition.resourceId})
